hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: vDeployImage
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Tag des generierten bzw. deployten Images

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Bitte Branch auswählen, der für die Pipeline verwendet werden soll

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
repo = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/' + params.branch + '/api_webgisclient/' + serviceName + '/deployment' vBaseImage = params.vBaseImage vDeployImage = params.vDeployImage replicas = params.replicas branch = params.branch namespace = params.namespace if ( namespace == 'gdi-test' ) { db_server = env.DB_SERVER_TEST geo_db_server = env.GEO_DB_SERVER_TEST environment = 'test' resources = ['cpu_request': '0', 'cpu_limit': '0', 'memory_request': '0', 'memory_limit': '0'] } else if ( namespace == 'gdi-integration' ) { db_server = env.DB_SERVER_INT geo_db_server = env.GEO_DB_SERVER_TEST environment = 'integration' resources = ['cpu_request': '200m', 'cpu_limit': '400m', 'memory_request': '125Mi', 'memory_limit': '250Mi'] } else if ( namespace == 'gdi-production' ) { db_server = env.DB_SERVER_PROD geo_db_server = env.GEO_DB_SERVER_PROD environment = 'production' resources = ['cpu_request': '400m', 'cpu_limit': '400m', 'memory_request': '250Mi', 'memory_limit': '250Mi'] } else { environment = 'test' resources = ['cpu_request': '0', 'cpu_limit': '0', 'memory_request': '0', 'memory_limit': '0'] }
if (params.containsKey("configs")) { buildNumber = params.buildNumber jobName = params.jobName build = 'ja' } else { buildNumber = BUILD_NUMBER jobName = JOB_NAME build = params.build } credentials = [ usernamePassword(credentialsId: (env.NAMESPACE_JENKINS) + '-pw-ogc-server' , usernameVariable: 'DbUserOgcServer' , passwordVariable: 'PwdOgcServer'), usernamePassword(credentialsId: (env.NAMESPACE_JENKINS) + '-pw-sogis-service' , usernameVariable: 'DbUserSogisService' , passwordVariable: 'PwdSogisService'), usernamePassword(credentialsId: (env.NAMESPACE_JENKINS) + '-pw-sogis-service-write' , usernameVariable: 'DbUserSogisServiceWrite' , passwordVariable: 'PwdSogisServiceWrite'), usernamePassword(credentialsId: 'jenkinsApi' , usernameVariable: 'apiUser' , passwordVariable: 'PwdApiUser') ]

"-f ${repo}/resources.yaml -p DB_SERVER=${db_server} -p GEO_DB_SERVER=${geo_db_server} -p DB_PUB=${env.PUB_DB} -p DB_EDIT=${env.EDIT_DB} -p DB_OEREB=${env.OEREB_DB} -p DB_SOGIS=${env.SOGIS_DB} -p USER_OGC_SERVER=${DbUserOgcServer} -p PW_OGC_SERVER=${PwdOgcServer} -p USER_SOGIS_SERVICE=${DbUserSogisService} -p PW_SOGIS_SERVICE=${PwdSogisService} -p USER_SOGIS_SERVICE_WRITE=${DbUserSogisServiceWrite} -p PW_SOGIS_SERVICE_WRITE=${PwdSogisServiceWrite} -p NAMESPACE=${namespace}"

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.name: Build new Image for featureinfo-service if necessary

value.value: Tag des generierten bzw. deployten Images
Bitte Branch auswählen, der für die Pipeline verwendet werden soll
